## Unit Overview

-   Introduce statistical conclusion validity
-   Explore sources of uncertainty in experiments
-   Introduce hypothesis testing
-   Examine the role of statistical power in determining sample size
-   Use simulation techniques for power calculations and design assessments
-   Discuss multiple hypothesis testing and its implications

### Preparation

-   Read:
    -   [Wager Chapter 1](https://web.stanford.edu/~swager/causal_inf_book.pdf)
    -   [Declare Design Book: 5.1, 8.2, 10](https://book.declaredesign.org/declaration-diagnosis-redesign/crafting-data-strategy.html)
-   Listen:
    -   [Experimental Design and Multiple Hypothesis Testing Podcast](media/Experimental%20Design%20and%20Multiple%20Hypothesis%20Testing.mp3)
